title: Want to Buy a Group of Graded T206 Cards
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: Want to Buy a Group of Graded T206 Cards
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I am looking to buy a group of T206 cards. I would consider a smaller group. But I'd prefer at least 25 cards in the group. I want PSA or SGC graded cards. They can range from PSA2/SGC 30 up to PSA5/SGC 60.

You can contact me through the Net 54 E-mail or send a message to me directly at [url]cyrilp@visuallink.com[/url]

Thanks.

Cy
